import "./style.css"; import { BrowserRouter as Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Layout, Card, Input, Col, Row, Select, Table, Button, Typography, } from "antd"; import { Form, Space } from "antd"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const { Content } = Layout; function handleChange(value) { console.log(`selected ${value}`); } const ThongTinHD = () => { const onFinish = (values) => { console.log("Received values of form: ", values); }; return (
); }; export default ThongTinHD;
